Classes in the default package are a little shaky in some of the specs, but 
let's see what we can do.
Changed Version field given new release numbering.

Peter, would you please help investigate this in the M6 timeframe? Although the 
default package is a big question mark in a number of J2EE specs (JSP, Web 
services) and may not ultimately be supportable, it is generating complaints 
and is something we should try to get working if possible.
*** Bug 102944 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
More users are reporting this problem.  We should try to get this into M9.
